metadata.name: !!! (REPENTOGON) Co-Op HUD+
metadata.description:
[h1] THIS MOD REQUIRES REPENTOGON, READ MORE [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3127536138]HERE[/url] [/h1] A mod for The Binding of Isaac: Repentence that changes the HUD to better display information when playing with multiple people. This mod is based on coopHUD by Srokks, which is no longer being updated.
This mod is currently a work-in-progress, all issues should be reported [url=https://github.com/Konoca/Co-Op_HUD_plus/issues] here [/url]
[h3] Features [/h3] [list] [*] Renders active items, hearts, pocket items, and trinkets in a readable position for all four players [*] Stats for all four players displayed relative to their character info (P1 & P3 on left, P2 & P4 on right) [*] Press H to switch between Co-Op HUD+ and the default HUD [*] Timer always shown at the top of the screen [*] Configurable using MCM (still a WIP) [*] Tainted Isaac Inventory correctly displayed for all players [*] Tainted ??? Poop Spells correctly displayed for all players [*] Tainted Cain Bag of Crafting correctly displayed for all players [/list]
[h3] Supported Mods [/h3] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787] Mod Config Menu [/url] [/list]
[h3] Recommended Mods to Enhance HUD [/h3] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2492654252] Boss Rush Wave Counter [/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2769063897] Unintrusive Pause Menu [/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=834199494] Better Health [/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362] Encyclopedia [/url] [/list]
